absolute.description: Applies position: absolute to the content element.
absolute.description_zh: 将 position： absolute 应用于 content 元素。

activator.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

activator-props.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

attach.description: Specifies which DOM element the overlay content should teleport to. Can be a direct element reference, querySelector string, or true to disable teleporting. Uses body by default.
attach.description_zh: 指定覆盖内容应传送到哪个 DOM 元素。可以是直接元素引用、querySelector 字符串或 true 以禁用传送。默认使用 body。

close-delay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait before the component shuts down. Applies only to hover and focus events.
close-delay.description_zh: 组件关闭前等待的毫秒数。仅应用于悬停和焦点事件。

close-on-back.description: Closes the overlay content when the browser’s back button is pressed or $router.back() is called, cancelling the original navigation. persistent overlays will cancel navigation and animate as if they were clicked outside instead of closing.
close-on-back.description_zh: 当按下浏览器的后退按钮或调用 $router.back（） 时关闭覆盖内容，从而取消原始导航。持久叠加将取消导航并制作动画，就好像它们在外部单击而不是关闭一样。

close-on-content-click.description: Closes component when you click on its content
close-on-content-click.description_zh: 单击组件内容时关闭组件

contained.description: Limits the size of the component and scrim to its offset parent. Implies absolute and attach.
contained.description_zh: 将元件和稀松布的大小限制为其偏移父项。表示绝对和附加。

content-class.description: Applies a custom class to the detached element. This is useful because the content is moved to the beginning of the v-app component (unless the attach prop is provided) and is not targetable by classes passed directly on the component
content-class.description_zh: 将自定义类应用于分离的元素。这很有用，因为内容被移动到 v-app 组件的开头（除非提供了 attach 属性），并且直接在组件上传递的类无法定位

content-props.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

disabled.description: Remove the ability to click or select a component to make it unavailable.
disabled.description_zh: 移除单击组件或选中组件的能力，将组件设置为不可用状态。

eager.description: Forces the component’s content to render when it mounts. This is useful if you have content that will not be rendered in the DOM that you want crawled for SEO.
eager.description_zh: 强制在装入组件时呈现组件的内容。如果您的内容不会在 DOM 中呈现，而您希望为 SEO 进行抓取，这将非常有用。

height.description: Sets the height of the component.

location-strategy.description: A function used to specifies how the component should position relative to its activator
location-strategy.description_zh: 用于指定组件相对于其激活器的位置的函数

max-height.description: Sets the maximum height of the component.

max-width.description: Sets the maximum width of the component.

min-height.description: Sets the minimum height of the component.

min-width.description: Sets the minimum width of the component.

:v-model.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the multiple prop, this defaults to an empty array
:v-model.description_zh: 组件的 v 模型值。如果组件支持 multiple 属性，则默认为空数组

no-click-animation.description: Disables the bounce effect when clicking outside of the content element when using the persistent prop.
no-click-animation.description_zh: 禁用在使用持久性道具时单击内容元素外部时的反弹效果。

offset.description: A single value that offsets content away from the target based upon what side it is on
offset.description_zh: 一个值，它根据内容所在的一侧将内容与目标偏移

open-delay.description: The number of milliseconds that the component waits before opening. Applies only to hover and focus events.
open-delay.description_zh: 组件打开前等待的毫秒数。仅应用于悬停和焦点事件。

open-on-click.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

open-on-focus.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

open-on-hover.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

origin.description: Sets the origin of the animation on the element. You can explore more for transition origin on the MDN documentation
origin.description_zh: 设置元素上的动画原点。您可以在 MDN 文档上浏览更多 for transition origin

persistent.description: Clicking outside of the element or pressing esc key will not deactivate it.
persistent.description_zh: 单击元素外部或按 esc 键不会停用它。

scrim.description: Accepts true/false to enable background, and string to define color.
scrim.description_zh: 接受 true/false 以启用背景，接受 string 以定义颜色。

scroll-strategy.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

theme.description: Specifies the theme of this component and all of its subcomponents
theme.description_zh: 指定此组件及其所有子组件的主题

transition.description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the
transition.description_zh: 设置组件过渡。可以是其中之一

width.description: Sets the width of the component.

z-index.description: The z-index used for the component

events.name: afterLeave
events.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

events.name: click:outside
events.description: Event that fires when clicking outside an active overlay.
events.description_zh: 在活动覆盖层外部单击时触发的事件。

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event that is emitted when the component’s model changes
events.description_zh: 组件模型更改时发出的事件
